numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are more athletes of color than head coaches of color.
2. This fact may mean that some retired athletes do not pursue a career in coaching.
3. I wonder what the trend has been in the past 10 years.
4. I wonder how this data compares internationally.
5. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is low.
6. I wonder what reasons retired players encounter.
7. I wonder what challenges retired players encounter.
8. These reasons and these challenges may prevent retired players from becoming coaches.
9. This data shows which sports are most diverse in athletic positions.
10. This data also shows which sports are most diverse in coaching positions.
11. This data makes me wonder whether coaches of color do not have enough merit to reach the big leagues.
12. The headline is: Diversity in sports is not as equal as we think.
